code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     ClusterStatsRequest clusterStatsRequest = new ClusterStatsRequest().nodesIds(request.paramAsStringArray("nodeId", null)).     clusterStatsRequest.timeout(request.param("timeout")).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().clusterStats(clusterStatsRequest, new NodesResponseRestListener<>(channel)). }
